Detailed Description

A class for New Activity window. It allows the user to insert a description and a deadline for the newer Activity It is studied for re-use, as it is completely isolated from the rest of the project. The user can confirm or reject the operation.

See also:
http://apps.sourceforge.net/trac/litesql/

http://doc.trolltech.com/4.5/index.html
